attributes.action: Cut car congestion by at least half
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Car congestion could be cut by at least half by the drastic step of limiting one car to one address. This would be by far the fairest, in terms of rich/poor financial considerations and it would NOT cost the government an enormous amount. Pricing drivers off the road is NOT a fair way of dealing with car congestion. This answer would certainly NOT be popular but what answers are?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
